special_text:
Whenever you cast a Strange spell, put a loyalty counter on Entity X and create a 1/1 blue Spirit creature token with flying.
[-3]: Return target nonland card from your graveyard to your hand if it’s Strange or has mana value 2 or less.
[-7]: Until the end of your next turn, you may cast any number of spells you own from outside the game. [i](You still pay their costs.)[/i]
